Uses of Package
story.book

  • Packages that use story.book 
    Package Description
    story.book  
    story.book.dataclient  
    story.book.test  
  • Classes in story.book used by story.book 
    Class and Description
    DecisionBranch
    Represents a decision that a reader of the story can take.
    DecisionBranchCreationController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing DecisionBranch objects to a StoryFragment.
    FragmentCreationController
    Controller responsible for adding and removing Illustration objects of a StoryFragment object for the StoryFragmentEditActivity.
    Illustration
    Base class for Illustrations.
    LocalEditingController
    Base abstract class for controllers for providing saving functionality to controllers modifying the currently active Story object.
    LocalStoryController
    Story controller for the LocalStoriesActivity to manage locally stored stories.
    OnlineStoryController
    StoryController to read and download locally stored stories.
    RequestingActivity
    Classes that want to use the RequestTextDialog need to implement this interface to get the returned text.
    Story
    Main class for representing stories which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryController
    StoryController interface for getting Story objects, lists of stories and saving stories.
    StoryCreationController
    Controller responsible for creating and editing instances of Story for the StoryFragmentListActivity.
    StoryFragment
    Model class for representing fragments of a story which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryInfo
    Class representing additional information about a Story object.
    StoryInfo.PublishState
    Defines the different publishing states of the story.
    StoryInfoController
    Controller responsible for creating, editing, displaying the StoryInfo of the current Story for the StoryInfoActivity and EditStoryInformationActivity.
    StoryModel
    Template model class for the application.
    StoryReadController
    Controller for accessing the current story and starting fragment for reading and adding annotations.
    StoryView
    Base View interface for the application Views.
    TextIllustration
    Illustration class with textual content.
  • Classes in story.book used by story.book.dataclient 
    Class and Description
    Illustration
    Base class for Illustrations.
    Story
    Main class for representing stories which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryInfo
    Class representing additional information about a Story object.
  • Classes in story.book used by story.book.test 
    Class and Description
    Story
    Main class for representing stories which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryFragment
    Model class for representing fragments of a story which extends the abstract class StoryModel.
    StoryInfo
    Class representing additional information about a Story object.
    TextIllustration
    Illustration class with textual content.
